resources.string: All your Cart history, Payment info and History, Location: (city and residential) you submitted will be preserved. You can always come next time
All search history, Account email, Cart info and history and payment and location information will be deleted.\nYou cannot recover

Payment for ordered items is is done immediately the person delivering the goods avails the items ordered to you. Before payment, check the status of your items for any damages. Also make sure you confirm the rider vehicle registration.

Pay the total amount shown above and proceed to confirm your order, Your payment will be confirmed in less than 5 mins and the goods should be on transit to your specified location. Remember you cannot delete an order after packaging and delivery in progress has been confirmed
